game.beginning: In a world where magic has been outlawed, you play as a young orphan who discovers they have the ability to wield it.
game.ending: With the help of a secret group of rebels, you defeat the tyrannical ruler and bring about a new era of peace and understanding.
game.synopsis: Echoes of Magic is an open-world RPG where you must navigate a treacherous landscape, mastering your magical abilities while evading those who seek to capture or kill you. Along the way, you'll uncover the secrets behind your powers and join forces with others to overthrow the oppressive regime that's ruled for centuries.
game.title: Echoes of Magic
